pageContext.title: Debut Sticky Navbar (Free Version)
pageContext.miniDescription: This is a solution for the Debut Theme to make the navigation bar sticky, coded by a certified (...)
pageContext.description:
This is a solution for the Debut Theme to make the navigation bar sticky, coded by a certified Shopify partner.

It contains all the code necessary to implement it on your already existing Debut theme.

Consider taking a look at the Debut Sticky Nav Pro as well. With the pro version you have embedded customization options at the Customize page. You can:

- Make the navbar bar sticky only on mobile, only on desktop or both
- Navbar only on homepage or all pages
- Control font size for navbar items on mobile
- Control font size for navbar items on desktop
- Make the announcement bar sticky only on mobile, only on desktop or both
- Announcement bar only on homepage or all pages
- Control font size for announcement bar text on desktop
- Control font size for announcement bar text on mobile


Besides that It has frequent updates, support and bug fixes:

https://ezfy.e-junkie.com/product/1689723


For installation instructions of the free and pro navbar, check the link below: 

https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-theme-sticky-navigation-bar-tutorial
